job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Devices,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ltstronggtltstronggtThe OpportunityltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtTeladoc Health is transforming how people access and experience healthcare Recognized as the world leader in virtual care we are partnering with over a thousand clients to serve hundreds of thousands soon millions of people living with chronic conditions every day Teladoc Health offers a whole person virtual care platform that empowers all people everywhere to live their healthiest lives by transforming the healthcare experience from acute and primary care to chronic care mental health and specialty care Our team of data scientists aggregate and interpret substantial amounts of health data and information to create actionable personalized and timely health signals for our members This approach delivers better clinical and financial outcomes while creating a different and better healthcare experience for people everywhereltbrgtltbrgtCome work for a datadriven innovator thats transforming the healthcare industry In your role as a Data Scientist you will be responsible for delivering datadriven insights and innovative analytical solutions that make quality of healthcare more accessible and affordable You will have opportunity to leverage the rich data at Teladoc Health and your data science skills to solve very diverse set of business problems ranging from customer acquisition and engagement to demand forecasting scheduling and clinical outcome analysis You will collaborate closely with engineers product managers fellow data scientists and business stakeholders on deliverables impacting millions of members and the growth of our businessltbrgtltbrgtThe ideal candidate will have solid background in statistical modeling and machine learning techniques with a heavy emphasis on knowing what statistical methods to use when in healthcare data outstanding business acumen intense curiosity and superior written and verbal communication skills and ability to tell a story visually in a simple way from complex analysis Shehe will have a strong bias toward data visualizations that support datadriven decision making Shehe will be a selfstarter lifelong learner comfortable with ambiguity able to think big while paying attention to detail and enjoy working in a fastpaced dynamic environmentltbrgtltbrgtThis highprofile highimpact opportunity on the Data Science team has huge advancement potential as well as the opportunity to leverage data in ways that truly make a difference in peoples livesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt Work closely with internal and external domain experts to perform thoughtful statistical analysis and distill key insights to improve the health outcomes of the growing member base ltligt ltligt Follow a model development process within a continuous quality improvement CQI process making the next insight quicker to find more accurate and useful and easier to deploy into action ltligt ltligt Support analysis modeling and experimentation for missioncritical functions within the clinical quality team driving improved care delivery and healthier outcomes for members ltligt ltligt Generate effective visualizations and data presentations to aid in conveying the key insights identified for clinical intervention to the enduser which is often a physician nurse or pharmacist ltligt ltligt Collaborate closely with stakeholders solve problems they face and help decision makers on the team form educated practical strategies and recommendations ltligt ltligt Proactively discover important trends in key metrics impacting our business and drive meaningful actions ltligt ltligt Support an equitable and inclusive model development process that is transparent to data limitationsdata lineage ltligt ltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtCandidate Profileltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgt ltligt 2 years experience in Data Science Healthcare Data Analytics Medical Information Systems or a related field ltligt ltligt Strong SQL skills ability to code in and analyze data with R or Python ltligt ltligt Strong data visualization  data story telling abilities mostly in Tableau ltligt ltligt Firm understanding of statistical and machine learning concepts experience with experimentation ltligt ltligt Strong critical thinking and active listening skills to infer business needs grasp underlying context and translate loose direction on analytical projects ltligt ltligt Capable of translating machine learning or mathematical models into interpretable actionable insights  you can tell the story that data has shown you so that our business partners can put it to good use ltligt ltligt A strong grasp of both the great value and limitations of data analytics and modelling in a clinical application ltligt ltligt The flexibility to respond to changing priorities and business environments ie extreme agile methodology ltligt ltligt Creatively helping to solve challenges in data analysis and modeling eg versioning of values sets and algorithms ltligt ltligt A Bachelors degree in computer science statistics information systems applied mathematics engineering or a related field ltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtOur Ideal Candidate Will Haveltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt Worked with clinically relevant ontologies eg IDC10 RXNorm SNOMED Codes CPT etc and supporting social determinants of health data eg datagov census etc ltligt ltligt Experience creating data visualizations with ggplot Matplotlib or Tableau ltligt ltligt High level of comfort with statistical analysis cohort comparisons linear regressions clinical risk adjustments propensity scoreing etc and research techniques ltligt ltligt A Masters degree in Epidemiology Statistics Computer Science or related field preferred ltligt ltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtWhy Join Teladoc HealthltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggtA New Category in Healthcareltstronggt  Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives  ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Work Truly Mattersltstronggt Recognized as the world leader in wholeperson virtual care Teladoc Health uses proprietary health signals and personalized interactions to drive better health outcomes across the full continuum of care at every stage in a persons health journey  ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtMake an Impact ltstronggtIn more than 175 countries and ranked Best in KLAS for Virtual Care Platforms in 2020 Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and datadriven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals  ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtFocus on PEOPLEltstronggt  Teladoc Health has been recognized as a top employer by numerous media and professional organizations Talented passionate individuals make the difference in this fastmoving collaborative and inspiring environment ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDiversity and Inclusionltstronggt  At Teladoc Health we believe that personal and professional diversity is the key to innovation We hire based solely on your strengths and qualifications and the way in which those strengths can directly contribute to your success in your new position  ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtGrowth and Innovationltstronggt  Weve already made healthcare yet remain on the threshold of very big things Come grow with us and support our mission to make a tangible difference in the lives of our Members ltbrgtltbrgtAs an Equal Opportunity Employer we never have and never will discriminate against any job candidate or employee due to age race religion color ethnicity national origin gender gender identityexpression sexual orientation membership in an employee organization medical condition family history genetic information veteran status marital status parental status or pregnancy including breastfeeding  we have a mothers room in both our offices In our innovative and inclusive workplace we prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kindltbrgtltbrgt95K 145K base salary range is based on full time employment Actual pay may vary based jobrelated skills qualifications certifications and experience This role may also be eligible for a discretionary bonus or commission payment in addition to equity incentives and a comprehensive benefits package
